sen.j: 衆生を導き、仏道の正法に引き入れること。
sen.e: Indo means guiding the living to the correct teachings of Buddha.

sen.j: 1から転じて、仏教における葬送儀礼の1つで、葬儀において僧侶が死者に対して読経を行った後に読誦される法語。
sen.e: Indo has expanded in meaning to be a Buddhist word that also describes the prayers a monk says to the dead after reading the sutra. This is one of the rituals performed at Buddhist funerals.
